Subject: IGL

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107

(Alright, I've said this several times and it is getting quite boring for me 
to say over and over and over.  The overall winner of the IGL Regular 
Division will receive five blank protoforms to be programmed into whatever 
the winner wants.  One could be a tyronasarus, one could be a mailbox.  The 
protoforms will be linked so they will form a gestalt team.

Now, the victor of the IGL Gestalt Division will receive a large amount of 
energon and spare parts.

How will this combat work?  Simple.  Same as ANY other fight in the NBW.  
Someone shoots, the person who being shot at responds, etc.  No special way.  
No popularity contests.  

For the Round One matches I will be making e-mails whose subjects are titled 
with the combatants of each match.  IE: Vehement VS Unitron, Bongiovi VS 
Grunge, etc.  Do NOT deviate from those names.  If I make an e-mail heading 
for Vehement VS Unitron and someone then makes an e-mail with the subject 
being "IGL Battle" and not the names of the combatants, I will end them.  By 
keeping the names of each subject to those who are fighting it makes it 
easier for me to track.  SO DON'T MESS WITH THE NAMES.

Thanks. 

-L. Unitron
